name: Info – Scott Davies
content:
I’m so sorry to reach out like this, but I have information about the Scott Davies case. Please email me at knockknock502@gmail.com
It’s about Reggie and Mel

name: Hook Message
content:
They've got you on a hook, little fish. You're not seeing the big picture.
Richard Holmes wasn't a cleaner.
Don't take my word for it. Look him up on their own database.
His name was Richard Holmes. Look him up.

Stop being the fish. Start being the hook.
